datas.title: Full-stack Developer
datas.description: I collaborated with product managers and cross-functional teams to deliver seamless, scalable web solutions. Developed and maintained well-documented Node.js APIs, and built a responsive React interface that supported user activity reporting. Also implemented a gamification system with quizzes and challenges to drive user engagement and platform growth.

datas.title: Software Engineer Backend I
datas.description: Developed and maintained Node.js APIs with documentation in Jira and Postman, supported by unit testing in Jest. Collaborated with product managers and cross-functional teams to enable electronic signatures for vehicle handovers, improving process efficiency. Implemented invoice generation for transaction reports and handled production hotfixes to ensure stable system performance.
